___units.description: Units in which the population size is measured

___name.description: A name for the item, useful to identify it later

___description.description: A short description of the population

___level.description: Whether the item is a single individual, or a population

___taxa.description: The identifier (or URI) of the taxa object to which the item belongs.

___owner.description: A single related resource. Can be either a URI or set of nested resource data.

___size.description: If the item is a population, the number of individuals or biomass

___traits.description: A list of traits values indentifiers (or URIs) that were measured on this item.
